casebody.data:
Moshe MEISELS, Chanie Meisels, Monroe Estates, Ltd., and Premier Estates NY, Inc., Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
FOX ROTHSCHILD LLP and Anthony Argiropoulos, Esquire, Defendants-Petitioners. C-350 September Term 2018
081534 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 16, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003519-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
